Package facade

Interface FacadeInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Facade
public interface FacadeInterface
Global facade interface.

      Add a cellar reader.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add to readers.
      cellar - The cellar to add the user to.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the update was successful, otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException

      Parameters:
      cellar - The cellar to add the emplacement to.
      wall - The wall to add the emplacement to.
      emplacementBottle - The emplacement to add.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the update was successful otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException

    • removeEmplacement

      org.bson.types.ObjectId removeEmplacement(Cellar cellar, Wall wall, EmplacementBottle emplacementBottle) throws BadArgumentsException
      Remove an emplacement from a wall.
      Parameters:
      cellar - The cellar to remove the emplacement from.
      wall - The wall to remove the emplacement from.
      emplacementBottle - The emplacement to remove.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the update was successful otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException

    • increaseBottleQuantity

      org.bson.types.ObjectId increaseBottleQuantity(Cellar cellar, Wall wall, EmplacementBottle emplacementBottle, BottleQuantity bottleQuantity) throws BadArgumentsException
      Increase the quantity of a bottle in a cellar.
      Parameters:
      cellar - The cellar to increase the quantity in. The cellar must contain the wall.
      wall - The wall to increase the quantity in. the wall must be in the cellar and contain emplacementBottle.
      emplacementBottle - The emplacement to increase the quantity in. The emplacement must be in the wall and contain the bottle.
      bottleQuantity - The bottle to increase the quantity of. The bottle must be in the emplacement.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the bottle was found and updated otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException

    • decreaseBottleQuantity

      org.bson.types.ObjectId decreaseBottleQuantity(Cellar cellar, Wall wall, EmplacementBottle emplacementBottle, BottleQuantity bottleQuantity) throws BadArgumentsException
      Decrease the quantity of a bottle in a cellar if the quantity is greater than 0, else remove the bottle.
      Parameters:
      cellar - The cellar to increase the quantity in. The cellar must contain the wall.
      wall - The wall to increase the quantity in. the wall must be in the cellar and contain emplacementBottle.
      emplacementBottle - The emplacement to increase the quantity in. The emplacement must be in the wall and contain the bottle.
      bottleQuantity - The bottle to increase the quantity of. The bottle must be in the emplacement.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated cellar if the quantity is greater than 0 and the field has been updated otherwise throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException

    • getPublicCellars
